description: Contributed to production features, UI/UX consistency, backend enhancements and LLM-based integrations.
details: Working across frontend and backend to improve product usability, system performance, and automation pipelines, while collaborating with cross-functional teams for deployments and feature delivery.

projects.name: Invoice UI Design System
projects.details: Currently designing and implementing an invoice experience with customizable layouts and reusable UI components.

projects.name: Website Theming
projects.details: Built and improved UI consistency and site-wide theming support ensuring customizable experiences across products.

projects.name: AI Integration Demo
projects.details: Developed a demo project with LLM-based interactions to showcase AI-driven improvements for speaker workflows.

description: Worked on search improvements, performance optimization and microservices within a production environment.
details: Enhanced the search algorithm, optimized cache latency through traffic rerouting, and contributed to unit testing and Agile workflows in a distributed microservices setup.

projects.name: Search Algorithm Upgrade
projects.details: Enhanced search support with multi-query handling using Prose and integrated deep linking for efficient navigation.

projects.name: Cache Latency Optimization
projects.details: Reduced latency by implementing traffic rerouting strategies and optimizing caching mechanisms using Golang and gRPC.
